author: Jacob Knutson
title: Moscow's Ukraine invasion further frays U.S.-Russia space relations
description: Russia's space director warned that retaliatory sanctions could "destroy" cooperation on the ISS.
content: Moscow's unprovoked invasion of Ukraine has further inflamed Russia's already-damaged relationship with the United States in space and could "destroy" their cooperation on the International Space Staâ€¦ [+2706 chars]
